item.title: Docker Golang
item.description: again this is for my self reference or for easy copy-paste for new projects. Assume this is the production grade program we need to dockerize and run. package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("saying hello to the world") } Basic FROM golang:1.14-alpine as builder WORKDIR /go/src/github.com/shabinesh/prog COPY main.go . COPY vendor ./vendor RUN go build -o main . FROM alpine:latest RUN apk --no-cache add ca-certificates WORKDIR / COPY --from=0 /go/src/github.
